Title: Famous people, famous words -- Lu Xun
Publisher: Neimenggu daxue chubanshe (内蒙古大学出版社)
Notes: "Famous people, famous words" is an educational series from 1996, presenting a number of famous persons, both Chinese and foreign, and their famous utterances. This quote from Lu Xun reads: "What is a road? It is trampled on from a place where there is no road, opened from a place where there are only thorns" (什么是路?就是从没路的地方践踏出来的，从只有荆棘的地方开辟出来的). In other words, you need to find a new way without avoiding difficulties.
